quoteText: Although we do our best to honor the privacy preferences of our users, we are unable to respond to Do Not Track signals set by your browser at this time.
title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
tosdr.tldr: In the Privacy Policy, it states that, "Although we do our best to honor the privacy preferences of our users, we are unable to respond to Do Not Track signals set by your browser at this time."
